participant_1.background:
I love to listen to music while I'm working on my photography projects.
I had to give up my two dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
i do not like my job.
I enjoyed a nice walk outside to appreciate the weather.
I enjoy a nice cup of coffee while listening to records on my record player.

participant_2.background:
I'm always making delicious French fries for my family.
i want to teach kids in elementary school.
both of my parents are doctors.
I spend my days reading mystery novels and exploring the mountains, but I usually wake up late.
I went to an interfaith event last year, and it was really wonderful to see people from different religions come together in prayer.

content.text: Hello! I had a nice day, I went for a walk outside.
Hello! Glad to hear that. I spent my day reading mystery novels and exploring the mountains.
Sounds fun! What kind of mystery novels do you like?
I like any kind, but I recently read one about a young woman who was murdered in her home. It was really good.
Oh, that sounds interesting. I like mysteries that are a little bit scary.
Me too! I love when the plot twists are unexpected.
What do you like to do on the weekends?
I usually wake up late, read some more, then go for a walk.
Sounds like a nice way to spend a day. I usually go for a walk in the park with my dogs.
Oh, that sounds nice. Do you have any other pets?
I had to give up my dogs when I moved, but I'm excited to get a new puppy when I settle in.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure you'll find a great new puppy soon
